title: What kind of toys/games do you like?
selftext:
[GAMES!!](https://preview.redd.it/1x0cs799z3oa1.jpg?width=512&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=cb7db43c7be3385f1d869b72b8cdcf6abfac6c69)

I'm a product designer, I'm working to make physical games/toys. I'm asking all of you of any age(if possible please mention) to everyone what kind of games you like. (non-mobile) 

For example, our beloved snakes and ladder, monopoly, uno cards, twister, Science Kit toys, and fidget toys, what types of play games with your siblings? children? friends? Indoor. 

It would be really helpful if you all could tap into your childhood or current memories and share your experience, which would help me make better games for you. 

Thank you, I appreciate your time and effort.
comments:
I like card based games. Or games that don't need much bigger box. 

I also like few print and play games.
I think doing a survey with google forms would gain more traction
Socializing was the most important factor regarding physical games rather than the game itself. So, I'd say focus on the social aspect of the game.

Carrom board brings back good memories of my childhood. 

College had billiards and pool, I love to play that with friends.

I've also tried a lot of board games but they're not very popular in India.
What kind of print and play games are you referring to?
I hope people respond, even in this thread very few responses :⁠'⁠(
boardgame geeks have some good recommendations.

Exploding kittens  
Monopoly  
UNO  


anything other than the typical chess and LUDO as it gets stagnant games like Monopoly and uno allows befriending or fucking some over
